channel.title: [PI] Spectral's World [PI]
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt]Spectral's World[/size][/center]
I do not give anyone, permission to release this anywhere else.
This is my first ever source I've ever released and edited so constructive criticism would be nice. Also I'm releasing because I've moved on too a new project a 289 Deob look alike, I would've done more, but the 289 swept me off my feet.
[left][u][b]Credits[/b][/u][/left] [u]Sanity[/u] [u]Marcbob[/u] [u]Me[/u]
[u][b]Features[/b][/u] All new, never before seen home 100% Working Spirit Shields 100% All Chaotics 100% All PvP Armors 100% All Godsword Specials 100% Banking with 500 Bank Spaces and Noting 100% Anti-Xfering, Max Ip's allowed (1), Max Starter items (2). 100% Pickpocketing support 100% Woodcutting 100% Working Fight Pits 100% Working thieving stalls Turmoil works with correct stats, (incorrect animation) Donator Status with Benefits Donator Shop 100% Working statius and Vesta's Longsword Special
[b][u]What are some more things you've done?[/u][/b] I've added a new home for one. I've added degrading vesta's/statius (not morrigans or zuriels yet), (degrades after 3 hours gameplay combat) I've upped the max hit of Morrigan's Javelins from 23 to 64. (Depending on Range levels and bonus's) I've upped the max hit of the Armadyl Godsword as its extremely rare but lowered its hit accuracy with special. I've fixed a few dupes e.g the one where you x-withdraw from bank into trade. I've added the CORRECT stats to turmoil as the old source had just the piety stats. I've also fixed the divine spirit shield so it absorbs some damage dealt. I've modified skilling experience so its x250 for all skills. I've added a ::commands to show you what you can do. I've added a teleport to edgeville from home.
[b][u]Downloads[/u][/b] Client http://uppit.com/xkvik4edyi2h/Fallen_Pkers_Client_V3.rar (credits to Marcbob for client)
Source http://uppit.com/mhbtnh5lo5rc/Spectral's_world.rar
[u][b]Pictures[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i1040.photobucket.com/albums/b401/AcornsTheName1/home.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1040.photobucket.com/albums/b401/AcornsTheName1/dshop.png[/img]

Things you can expect in v2 -Working Turmoil with Animation- (click the image) [URL=http://s1040.photobucket.com/albums/b401/AcornsTheName1/?action=view&current=clip0677.mp4][IMG]http://i1040.photobucket.com/albums/b401/AcornsTheName1/th_clip0677.jpg[/img][/URL]

[quote=“Acorn_, post:57, topic:388854”]I did not.
Its only a problem that persists with your files, if you can’t figure these problems out this isn’t the source for you, I’m sorry.[/quote]
How does it persist with my files, i did not edit any npc drops or barrows, this means that whatever i downloaded already had these problems, and this source i found to be great, even with the divine effect and most specs, it was perfect. I realise i may not be worth the hassle, but i would appreciate if you could help me, i will rep++.

~Regards,
X Revolution

item.title: [PI] Spectral's World [PI]
item.dc:creator: @X_Revolution X Revolution
item.description:
@X_Revolution wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:55, topic:388854”]Go to playerassistant.java
Add this at the barrows bit of code.

Then under the last public static add this,

public int randomBarrows() { return Barrows[(int)(Math.random()*Barrows.length)]; }[/quote]
I already have that, and with the dropson? Do i just type that as an owner and they work because when i did that it still didn’t work… sorry to hassle you. I’m just concerned how you released this with these problems.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Go to playerassistant.java
Add this at the barrows bit of code.

Then under the last public static add this,

public int randomBarrows() { return Barrows[(int)(Math.random()*Barrows.length)]; }
